fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Copy a change from <#981346105231032340> to your role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the change mentions abilities/attributes, you will get all that were mentioned.
- If your attack value ever changes, you gain an attacking ability.
-Upon winning the game, you may post a picture of grapes in <#970059745807437876> . If you post anything other than grapes your win is revoked.
